TopicTitle: [MOD] set flow of external RCS tanks

Articles.Content:
i wasnt sure where to pst this, so ill do it here,

i have a set up here using the cart mod, and i have two rcs tanks on the rover, but those by default are the first things to be used when the rcs is fired even on the first few stages, any ideas?
You can take off the rover\'s RCS tanks, trash them, and then put new ones on. That should make them drain last.
